description:
Given the following JSP:

-------- InvalidUsage.jsp -----------

<jsp:fallback>fallback_text</jsp:fallback>

-------------------------------------

The following error is returned:
org.apache.jasper.JasperException: /JspParamsUsageContextTest.jsp(10,5) The
action is not a recognizable standard action.

This is misleading as jsp:fallback is a standard action.
summary: jsp:fallback action used outside of the expected context yields misleading error message.
